quote: Slowly I'm renewing my soul
speaker: Virginia Woolf

quote: work smart, not hard
speaker: jackson Nkhata

quote: Sometimes life is going to hit you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith
speaker: Steve Jobs

quote: Even Fiction Becomes Real When You Start Believing It
speaker: Palash Bauri

quote: The present is theirs; the future, for which I really   worked, is mine.
speaker: Nikola Tesla

quote: 640K ought to be enough for anybody
speaker: Bill Gates

quote: Don’t compare yourself with anyone in this world…if you do so, you are insulting yourself.
speaker: Bill Gates

quote: Don't believe anything you read on the net. Except this. Well, including this, I suppose.
speaker: Douglas Adams

quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.
speaker: Bill Gates

quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
speaker: Nelson Mandela

quote: We need fantasy to survive because reality is too difficult
speaker: Lady GaGa

quote: And every shooting star is proof. Falling can be beautiful when you give it all you've got.
speaker: Alicia N Green

quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
speaker: Stephen Hawking

quote: Never buy gold, simply earn it.
speaker: Mary Kom

quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
speaker: Virat Kohli

quote: The most dangerous phrase in our language is 'We have always done it that way.'
speaker: Grace Hopper

quote: You get what you give
speaker: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things.
speaker: Isaac Newton

quote: People worry that computers will get too smart and take over the world, but the real problem is that they're too stupid and they've already taken over the world.
speaker: Pedro Domingos (Author of The Master Algorithm)

quote: Pursue the things you love doing and then do them so well that people can't take their eyes off of you.
speaker: Maya Angelou

quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
speaker: Buddha

quote: It’s not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
speaker: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism. Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
speaker: Aristotle

quote: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
speaker: Leo Tolstoy

quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
speaker: Albert Einstein

quote: The things that make you strange are the things that make you powerful.
speaker: Ben Platt

quote: Joy is really the simplest form of gratitude.
speaker: Karl Barth

quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
speaker: Julia Child

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
speaker: Mark Twain

quote: Have nothing in your house that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful.
speaker: William Morris

quote: Don't comment bad code - rewrite it
speaker: Brian Kernighan

quote: Never Stop Being You. ✌
speaker: Anonymous

quote: Plans are worthless, but planning is everything.
speaker: Dwight Eisenhower

quote: Good Monday Moooorning!!!.
speaker: Mario Grullon

quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
speaker: Roy T. Bennett

quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is a gift of God, which is why we call it the present.
speaker: Bill Keane

quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
speaker: Francis of Assisi

quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
speaker: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
speaker: Albert Einstein

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
speaker: Oscar Wilde

quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
speaker: Albert Einstein

quote: It all takes a little push to fly high.
speaker: Amarjeet Rao

quote: Whoever wishes peace among peoples must fight statism.
speaker: Ludwig von Mises

quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
speaker: Carol Burnett

quote: The world is your oyster.
speaker: Shakespeare

quote: You can’t connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future.
speaker: Steve Jobs

quote: I'd rather be hated for who I am than loved for who I am not.
speaker: Kurt Cobain

quote: If you want to build a ship, don't drum up people together to collect wood and don't assign them tasks and work, but rather teach them to long for the endless immensity of the sea.
speaker: Antoine de Saint Exupery

quote: At forty, I was too old to work as a programmer myself anymore; writing code is a young person’s job
speaker: Michael Crichton

quote: Winning and losing isn't everything. Sometimes, the journey is just as important as the outcome..
speaker: Alex Morgan

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
speaker: Elon Musk

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
speaker: Stephen Chbosky

quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
speaker: Chanakya, Indian philosopher, economist, jurist and royal advisor.

quote: Lightning makes no sound until it strikes.
speaker: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
speaker: Isaac Asimov

quote: When you do things right, people won't be sure you've done anything at all.
speaker: God Entity, Futurama

quote: Everyone knows that debugging is twice as hard as writing a program in the first place. So if you're as clever as you can be when you write it, how will you ever debug it?
speaker: Brian Kernighan

quote: There’s only one way to get good at anything; you surround yourself with the best who are doing exactly you do and you force yourself to keep up and inspire each other.
speaker: Joe Rogan

quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
speaker: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Cogito ergo sum. (I think; therefore I am)
speaker: Rene Descartes

quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
speaker: Charles Darwin

quote: No valid plans for the future can be made by those who have no capacity for living now
speaker: Alan Watts
